segments.text: Good evening , sir . I understand that you have been robbed .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I certainly have .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: When did this happen ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: About two hours ago .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Why didn't you report it before ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I couldn't . I was bound and gagged .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Please tell me exactly what happened .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I was sitting in this room watching television when someone knocked on the door . Without thinking , I opened it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That wasn't very wise , sir .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I know . I was expecting my wife , you see , and thought it was her .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You should never open a door without looking to see who it is .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I know . I regret it very much .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What happened ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Two men pushed into the flat . One of them threatened me with a knife while the other bound and gagged me .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Did you get a good look at them ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm afraid not . They were both wearing stockings over their faces .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What did they take ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: My wallet , with $ 200 in it , my wrist watch.some of my wife's jewellery from our bedroom , and a silver photoframe .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: They don't seem to have done much damage to the flat .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No . They had just begun to search when the dogs next door began to bark . Theran off then leaving me bound and gagged . It was some time before my wifereturned and released me . I phoned the police at o
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: My men began searching the area as soon as we received your call . I can't promise you that we'll recover your property but we'll certainly do our best .
segments.speaker: S1
